MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH46 postcode area of Moreton affecting properties in Stuart Close, Wimbrick Close, Wimbrick Hey and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:00am on 2nd November 2020.
